projects.description: An app that displays random quotes from famous historical figures, writers, and entertainers at the click of a button.
A registration form for a fictional conference that includes real-time form validation, conditional fields, and custom error messages. Creates a better user experience with immediate feedback.
A browser-based, word guessing game: 'Phrase Hunter'. Users select a random, hidden phrase, which a player tries to guess, by clicking letters on an onscreen keyboard.

The Employee Directory is a clean, responsive web app that showcases team members in an at‑a‑glance gallery with photos, names, emails, and locations. Clicking any profile opens a sleek modal card revealing each employee’s full contact details.

The Student Roster site loads any size list of student records, presenting the first nine profiles—photo, name, and email—in a neat, responsive gallery. Intuitive pagination buttons let visitors flip through additional pages instantly, all powered by pure JavaScript for flexible data handling without external libraries.
